arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Official medical update: 2 bad news for Paris!
arts.sum: This Sunday, Paris Saint-Germain will face Nantes at the Stade de la Beaujoire for Matchday 1 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). After Friday’s training session, on the eve of the match, the club provided an update on the players’ absences. As a reminder, João Neves (20-year-old midfielder) is suspended.
